name: The Overflow
title: Candace: The Overflow
desc: Those who do not respect the regulations at cards...\nAre the enemy of all who love the game.
in_play_description: When this card is equipped by Candace, her Prayer of the Crimson Crown has the following extra effect: After your character uses a Normal Attack: Deals 1 Hydro DMG. (Once per Round)

attributes.source: Reward for inviting Candace to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

skills.desc:
Combat Action: When Candace is your active character, equip this card.
After Candace equips this card, she will immediately use Sacred Rite: Wagtail's Tide once.
When this card is equipped by Candace, her Prayer of the Crimson Crown has the following extra effect: After your character uses a Normal Attack: Deals 1 Hydro DMG. (Once per Round)
(You must have Candace in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
